tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: We will cover several topics! Let's make a quick list to use as a guide along the way!

translations.text: Wir werden mehrere Themen behandeln! Lassen Sie uns eine kurze Liste erstellen, die Ihnen als Leitfaden dient!

paragraphs.text: The Trigger Stage with it's three events (Trigger On Event, Trigger Off Event, and Take Position Event).

translations.text: Die Trigger Stage mit ihren drei Events (Trigger On Event, Trigger Off Event und Take Position Event).

paragraphs.text: Basic definitions including what is a Situation, a Condition, and a Formula.
Syntax, or how to write conditions and formulas.

translations.text: Syntax, oder wie man Bedingungen und Formeln schreibt.

paragraphs.text: Indicator properties and how to use them.
Open, Manage, and Close Stages basics.

translations.text: Grundlagen der Open, Manage und Close Stages.

paragraphs.text: Have you read about these topics? No worries... you will!
